text: Vital Miranda Whitford was the founder of Asociación de Scouts de Nicaragua, Nicaragua's scouting administrative organization. He founded the group in 1929 in Granada, Nicaragua with the help of a local Catholic priest.http://www.laprensa.com.ni/2003/03/31/nacionales/854082-los-scouts-de- nicaragua-nacieron-en-bluefields LaPrensa ==References== Category:Scouting and Guiding in Nicaragua
title: Vital Miranda Whitford
